      • aDotDot

        public double aDotDot
        this is a.. of eqn (2) of the paper. a_.. = summation_{i:1,n}( a_i ) where a_i = summation_{j:1,n}( a_i_j ) where a_i_j = |x_i - x_j|_p and |·|_p is the euclidean norm in real space with dimension p

      • ai

        public double[] ai
        this is a_i of eqn (2) of the paper. where a_i = summation_{j:1,n}( a_i_j ) where a_i_j = |x_i - x_j|_p where p is the number of dimensions of vector x and |·|_p is the euclidean norm in real space with dimension p

      • bDotDot

        public double bDotDot
                 this is b.. of eqn (2) of the paper.
         b_.. = summation_{i:1,n}( b_i )
         where b_i = summation_{j:1,n}( b_i_j )
         where b_i_j = |y_i - y_j|_q
         where q is the number of dimensions of vector y
         and |·|_q is the euclidean norm in real space with dimension q

      • bi

        public double[] bi
                 this is b_i of eqn (2) of the paper.
         where b_i = summation_{j:1,n}( b_i_j )
         where b_i_j = |y_i - y_j|_q
         where q is the number of dimensions of vector y
         and |·|_q is the euclidean norm in real space with dimension q

      • iv1

        public double[] iv1
        iv1(j) = summation_{i .lt. j, y_i .lt. y_j}( 1 )

      • iv2

        public double[] iv2
        iv2(j) = summation_{i .lt. j, y_i .lt. y_j}( x_i )

      • iv3

        public double[] iv3
        iv3(j) = summation_{i .lt. j, y_i .lt. y_j}( y_i )

      • iv4

        public double[] iv4
        iv4(j) = summation_{i .lt. j, y_i .lt. y_j}( x_i * y_i )
